entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:25 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: ESE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing rain over higher terrain. Fog patches. Low zero. Forecast issued 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain over higher terrain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
